name: Sergel 20 (10 pcs)
desc: Esomeprazole is used to treat chronic heartburn and other symptoms associated with GERD.

name: Azyth 500 (3 pcs)
desc: Azithromycin is indicated for infections (caused by susceptible organisms) in lower respiratory tract infections including bronchitis and pneumonia

name: Moxaclav 625 (6 Pcs)
desc: Upper respiratory tract contaminations (counting ENT) e.g.tonsillitis,sinusitis,otitis media. Lower respiratory tract contaminations e.g.acute and constant bronchitis, lobar and bronchopneumonia.

name: Clacido 625 (6 Pcs)
desc: Co-amoxiclav is used to treat bacterial infections in the following places for a short period of time. Tonsillitis, sinusitis, and otitis media are examples of upper respiratory tract infections (including ENT).

name: Surgical Face Masks Disposable 50 Pcs
desc: Face Mask, Disposable, 3Ply, with Elastic ear loop, with filter. Designed for higher risk fluid environments. Provides excellent bacterial and particle filtration.

name: Glaxose D (Glucose Powder) 400 gm
desc: Glaxose-D Glucose Powder helps to provide instant energy. · It contains Calcium for bone health. · It contains Vitamin C also
